remarks: Swap denominators of two ratios.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-1999.)
statement:
divclz.1 $e |- A e. CC $.
divclz.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
divmulz.3 $e |- C e. CC $.
divmuldiv.4 $e |- D e. CC $.
divmuldiv.5 $e |- B =/= 0 $.
divmuldiv.6 $e |- D =/= 0 $.
divmul13i $p |- ( ( A / B ) x. ( C / D ) ) = ( ( C / B ) x. ( A / D ) ) $.
